preferences.name: 2FAuth URL
preferences.description: The URL for your 2FAuth Instance (ex https://2fauth.domain.com)

preferences.name: Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Create a PAT from your 2FAuth account settings (under OAuth)

preferences.name: Cache Duration (hours)
preferences.description: Set the maxiumum number of hours to keep account names stored locally.  The cache can be manually refreshed using the 'sync' command.

preferences.name: Max Account Display
preferences.description: Set the maxiumum number of accounts to display in the response list
